welcome_message_body: Welcome to Gardena, a charming city known for its rich cultural heritage, beautiful parks, and delicious local cuisine. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Gardena has to offer during your stay.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Compton Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated to private flights and offers exclusive amenities for passengers.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Tom Bradley International Terminal
terminals.description: The largest terminal at LAX, serving international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: Serving domestic and international flights for Southwest Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Serving domestic and international flights for Delta Air Lines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: Serving domestic and international flights for American Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: Serving domestic and international flights for United Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: Serving domestic and international flights for JetBlue and Hawaiian Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 6
terminals.description: Serving domestic and international flights for Alaska Airlines and Air Canada.

terminals.name: Terminal 7
terminals.description: Serving domestic and international flights for United Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 8
terminals.description: Serving domestic and international flights for American Airlines.

wifi.note: Limited free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport. Premium Wi-Fi is also available for purchase.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Long Beach Municipal Airport serves all commercial flights and is equipped with modern amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Long Beach Municipal Airport primarily serves private and charter flights, with a separate entrance and facilities for these travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Municipal Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at El Monte Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at El Monte Airport is reserved for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Bob Hope Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Bob Hope Airport, primarily serving regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
